languages.text: {n}Вокс под потолком оживает, и из него изливается торжественная бинарная ария, переходящая в трещащий, сонный голос.{/n} "В сей темный час готов благовествовать вам, технобратья! Вы же ответьте строками Второго Гальванического Гимна".

traits.locale_text: {n}Из вокса под потолком льется звук — высокие бинарные трели, мерное гудение, заикающийся треск.{/n} "Д-даже в сей темный час г-готов благовествовать вам, с-собратья! Вы же ответьте с-строками Второго Гальванического Г-гимна".

languages.text: {n}The vox on the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binharic aria that turns into a crackling, somnolent voice:{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-brethren! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс под потолком оживает, и из него изливается торжественная бинарная ария, переходящая в трещащий, сонный голос.{/n} "В сей темный час готов благовествовать вам, технобратья! Вы же ответьте строками Второго Гальванического Гимна".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox under the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binary aria that turns into a crackling, sleepy voice.{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-comrades! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."

{n}The vox under the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binary aria that turns into a crackling, sleepy voice.{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-comrades! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."

{n}The vox under the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binharic aria that turns into a crackling, sleepy voice.{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-brethren! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."

{n}The vox under the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binharic aria that turns into a crackling, sleepy voice.{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-brethren! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."

{n}The vox on the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binharic aria that turns into a crackling, somnolent voice:{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-brethren! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."

{n}The vox on the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binharic aria that turns into a crackling, somnolent voice:{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-brethren! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."

languages.text: {n}Das Vox-System unter der Decke erwacht zum Leben und lässt eine feierliche binhäre Arie ertönen, die sich in eine knisternde, schläfrige Stimme verwandelt.{/n} "In dieser dunklen Stunde bin ich bereit, Euch frohe Kunde zu bringen, Techbrüder! Nun antwortet mit den Worten der Zweiten Galvanischen Hymne."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox on the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binharic aria that turns into a crackling, somnolent voice:{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-brethren! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox-System unter der Decke erwacht zum Leben und lässt eine feierliche binhäre Arie ertönen, die sich in eine knisternde, schläfrige Stimme verwandelt.{/n} "In dieser dunklen Stunde bin ich bereit, Euch frohe Kunde zu bringen, Techbrüder! Nun antwortet mit den Worten der Zweiten Galvanischen Hymne."

languages.text: {n}Le vox installé au plafond s'active, laissant échapper une mélodie binhaire solennelle qui se mue en une voix somnolente entrecoupée de crachotements.{/n} « En cette heure sombre, je m'apprête à vous apporter de bonnes nouvelles, ô technofrères ! Répondez en récitant les paroles du second hymne galvanique. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox on the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binharic aria that turns into a crackling, somnolent voice:{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-brethren! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox installé sous le plafond s'active, laissant échapper une mélodie binhaire solennelle qui se mue en une voix somnolente entrecoupée de crachotements.{/n} « En cette heure sombre, je m'apprête à vous apporter de bonnes nouvelles, ô technofrères ! Répondez en récitant les paroles du second hymne galvanique. »

languages.text: {n}天花板中的音阵装置重新启动，发出庄严肃穆的二进制咏叹调，随后很快又变成了单调朦胧的声音，噼啪作响。{/n}“在这黑暗的时刻，我已准备好你们带来启示，技术同胞们！现在，用第二流电赞美诗来回应吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox on the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binharic aria that turns into a crackling, somnolent voice:{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-brethren! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."

traits.locale_text: {n}天花板下的音阵装置重新启动，发出庄严肃穆的二进制咏叹调，随后很快又变成了睡意朦胧的声音，噼啪作响。{/n}“在这黑暗的时刻，我已准备好你们带来启示，技术同胞们！现在，用第二伽凡尼赞美诗来回应吧。”

languages.text: {n}天井下のヴォクスが起動すると厳かなバイナリ聖歌が流れ出すが、パチパチいう音が混じった物憂げな声に変わる。{/n}「こんな苦しい時代に吉報を授けよう、技術同胞よ！第二ガルヴァニック聖歌の言葉で応えよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox on the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binharic aria that turns into a crackling, somnolent voice:{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-brethren! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."

traits.locale_text: {n}天井下のヴォクスが起動すると厳かなバイナリ聖歌が流れ出すが、パチパチいう音が混じった眠気を催す声に変わる。{/n}「こんな苦しい時代に吉報を授けよう、技術同胞よ！第二ガルヴァニック聖歌の言葉で応えよ」

languages.text: {n}El voco del techo cobra vida y deja escapar una solemne aria binárica que se convierte en una voz crepitante y somnolienta.{/n} «¡En esta hora oscura, voy a traeros buenas nuevas, tecnohermanos! Ahora responded con las palabras del Segundo Himno Galvánico».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox on the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binharic aria that turns into a crackling, somnolent voice:{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-brethren! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco bajo el techo cobra vida y deja escapar una solemne aria binárica que se convierte en una voz crepitante y somnolienta.{/n} «¡En esta hora oscura, voy a traeros buenas nuevas, tecnohermanos! Ahora responded con las palabras del Segundo Himno Galvánico».

languages.text: {n}Tavandaki voks, bir anda açılıyor ve ikilidilde dinî bir arya yayını yapmaya başlıyor. Müzik, çatırdayan, uykulu bir sese dönüşüyor.{/n} "Karanlığın üzerimize çöktüğü şu vakitlerde aydınlık havadisler getirdim tekno kardeşlerim! Şimdi İkinci Galvaniz İlahisi ile yanıt verin."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox on the ceiling comes alive and lets forth a solemn binharic aria that turns into a crackling, somnolent voice:{/n} "In this dark hour, I am ready to bring you good tidings, tech-brethren! Now respond with the words of the Second Galvanic Hymn."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tavandaki voks, bir anda açılıyor ve ikilidilde dinî bir arya yayını yapmaya başlıyor. Müzik, çatırdayan, uykulu bir sese dönüşüyor:{/n} "Karanlığın üzerimize çöktüğü şu vakitlerde aydınlık havadisler getirdim tekno kardeşlerim! Şimdi İkinci Galvaniz İlahisi ile yanıt verin."
